verbose_text: We used the whole CM from iRAS as an indicator to determine overall paracrine senescence in normal HFFF2 using a scramble (Scr) siRNA or previously validated siRNA targeting TP53 (sip53) and CDKN2A (sip16) as a positive control (green bars) and determined BrdU incorporation and p21 CIP protein levels by IF (XREF_FIG G and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY B).
